data.about_title: Your Trusted Fire Safety Partner Since 2010
data.about_subtitle: We are committed to providing comprehensive fire safety solutions with high-quality products and professional installation services.

about_sections.title: Who We Are
about_sections.subtitle: Fire Safety Experts Since 2010
about_sections.description: PT SafeFire Indonesia provides comprehensive fire safety solutions for commercial and residential buildings. With extensive experience in the industry, we deliver reliable protection systems that comply with all safety regulations.

points.title: Certified Technicians
points.description: Our installation teams are fully certified and regularly trained on the latest fire safety standards.

points.title: Quality Equipment
points.description: We use only high-quality, certified fire safety equipment to ensure maximum protection.

about_sections.title: Our Approach
about_sections.subtitle: Comprehensive Safety Solutions
about_sections.description: We take a holistic approach to fire safety, assessing your entire property to create an integrated protection system. Our solutions are tailored to your specific needs while ensuring compliance with all local regulations.

about_sections.title: Client Commitment
about_sections.subtitle: Your Safety Is Our Priority
about_sections.description: We stand behind our work with comprehensive warranties and ongoing support. Our maintenance programs ensure your fire safety systems remain effective for years to come with regular inspections and updates.

points.title: 24/7 Support
points.description: Our technical team is available around the clock to assist with any emergency situations.

points.title: Regular Maintenance
points.description: We provide scheduled maintenance services to ensure your systems remain in optimal condition.
